oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of 5th Avenue North and Charlotte Avenue, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the area near 5th Avenue North and Charlotte Avenue, circa 1950s. St. Mary's Catholic Church, the Andrew Jackson Hotel, and Ward's Tire Service are visible in the photograph. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
